sentences: Adrienne Eliza Houghton (née Bailon; born October 24, 1983) is an American television host, singer, and actress.
section: N/A

sentences: She is a former member of the girl groups 3LW and The Cheetah Girls.
section: N/A

sentences: Since 2013, Bailon has been a co-host of the daytime talk show The Real; for which she has since won a Daytime Emmy Award.
section: N/A

sentences: As an actress, Bailon appeared in The Cheetah Girls films, Coach Carter and All You've Got.
section: N/A

sentences: She has guest starred in numerous television series including That's So Raven (a role which she is to reprise in the spin-off series Raven's Home), and The Suite Life of Zack & Cody.
section: N/A

sentences: In 2013, Bailon became the first Latina host of a daytime talk show in the US.
section: N/A

sentences: She also competed in The Masked Singer in 2019 as the Flamingo, finishing in third place.

== Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: Relationships ===
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: Bailon dated Rob Kardashian, from 2007 until 2009, after which it was revealed that they broke up because he cheated on her.
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: On February 5, 2015, Bailon announced via Instagram and on an episode of The Real, that she was engaged to her boyfriend of six years, music executive at Jay-Z's Roc Nation label, Lenny Santiago.
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: In September 2015, the couple split and they called off their engagement.
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: Bailon got engaged to musician Israel Houghton on August 12, 2016 in Paris after six months of dating.
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: They were married in Paris on November 11, 2016.
section: == Personal life == | === Relationships ===

sentences: Bailon became the step-mother to Israel's four children from his first marriage.
